Microsoft CRM 2011 Release Candidate Available, Launch Date Set The move is an example of Steve Ballmer 's commitment last year that the company is "all in" on cloud computing. This is the first time we've made a release in the cloud before we have done so in the server version, and I think that really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud, Steve Ballmer said in a statement. In fact, Microsoft's Dynamics CRM Online service is based on Microsoft's Dynamics CRM 2011 package, which is set for its own launch on Thursday
